thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient to SFO
thread.title_full: Convenient to SFO - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Peter M
title: Convenient to SFO
text:
10 minutes with a simple route to/from SFO and rental cars. Average property in good repair with a great and engaging staff. Room was spotless with good lighting and multiple outlets and USB charging stations (Yes! Finally someone realises we need more than 1or 2). Shower and amenities were solid. Fridge in the room was a nice surprise. Cookie (yum) and water provided upon arrival (water is a nice add to weary travelers). Not sure this would be a vacation location...but solid and convenient for business travel. For those with an early flight...roll out of bed, drive to return rental car and be at check-in/security in about 30 minutes. To the management: kudos to Charliann for being a star performer.
Room Tip: Ask for bay facing room See more room tips
